          <title>
            <string language="en">Finding the centre of mass for an irregularly shaped object</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden der Mitte der Masse für eine

          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows a method for determining the centre of mass of an irregularly shaped object.</string>
